name: Musya: The Classic Japanese Tale of Horror
overview: Plunge into a world of ancient Japanese horror. As Imoto, a spear wielding Samurai, it's your duty to descend deep into the Abyss to save the world from the horrors of the Evil One. Fight through hordes of hideous monsters to save Shizuka, the keeper of the Talisman that seals the Evil One in his prison. It's up to you to save her. Use your fierce spear spin attack to weave a web of destruction. Call on magical farces to blast your way through the legions leprous beasts.
